str2: That, that one there, yonder. From ekei; that one (neuter) thing); often intensified by the article prefixed.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Sinning, sinful, depraved, detestable. From hamartano; sinful, i.e. A sinner.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.
Now, just now, at this moment. Adverb from a derivative of airo through the idea of suspension; just now.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
